categories: Category:Plants of the Outer Rim Territories

nodes.text: A species of large blue carnivorous plant with a bulbous mouth could be found on the jungle planet Felucia. During the search for the Kyber Saber, after youngling Rowan Freemaker, Jedi-in-training Luke Skywalker, and B1-series battle droid R0-GR "Roger" crashed their starship on Felucia, Roger briefly found himself eaten by one of these carnivorous plants before being forcefully spat out, all much to his disdain.
